channel.title: Alysson's Blog
channel.description: The thoughts and feelings of Alys

item.title: Transparency...
item.description: I titled that like your run-of-the-mill shady influencer, well... because I wanted to. Those people are jokes. But I do have something to get off of my chest! I hope you, dear reader, can find it in your heart to forgive me! ~~sarcastic~~ I originally was really really drawn to making a site for a few different reasons. One being the endless possiblities (ummm, hello... naming all of my niche interests and thoughts through the gigabytes of stamps and blinkies I have hoarded!!) and well,,, the...
